content:
Tomoyuki Suzuki is a research scientist at CyberAgent, Inc. and a Ph.D student at Keio University. He engages himself in research on computer vision and machine learning. For details, please also refer to CV.
_In my free time, I drink with my precious people, get inside the world of books, or travel around the world with my green backpack._  -- Interests He is generally interested in computer vision and machine learning. Especially, video understanding, image/video/multimodal representation learning and video decomposition.
Education  Ph.D. student in Computer Science (2021.10 - present)
Keio University, Aoki lab. Adviser：Prof. Yoshimitsu Aoki
 M.S. in Computer Science and Electronic Engineering (2017.4 - 2019.3)
Keio University, Aoki lab. Adviser：Prof. Yoshimitsu Aoki
 B.S. in Electronics and Electrical Engineering (2013.4 - 2017.3)
Keio University, Aoki lab. Adviser：Prof. Yoshimitsu Aoki

title: Tomoyuki Suzuki
